text: now thngai del yeung nung mour mekh dauchchea anak del mour kradeasa touk samreab sarser . yeung nung bangkeut( mnoussa lok) chea thmei mdong tiet( now thngai barlok) dauchdel yeung ban chabphdaem bangkeut moun dambaung dauchnaoh der . haey yeung ban sanyea nouv kechchasanyea muoy champoh khluon robsa yeung pitabrakd nasa yeung chea anak thveu( nouv avei del yeung ban sanyea)
